Scope | Stockholm | Full-time | Backend Engineer

Scope is a search-engine that makes it easy for brands to find relevant influencers. Phase: Early, on-boarded our first customers (mostly fashion brands), nice growth.

YOU: You love working with crazy and talented people. You want to be part of creating something new and scale from scratch to thousands of users. You might like neural networks, spend time with your family or sing. You might just like building a kick-ass search engine.

Are we getting close? If so, you should talk to us. Apply here: http://scopeapp.io/jobs

Salary: ok. Potentially moving to SF or LA within one year.

More about our product here: http://scopeapp.io/product
